| Rockruff is a rock Pok√©mob.
| Rockruff evolves into :doc:`lycanroc`:
|  -  At Level 25.
|  -  During the day.
| 
| Rockruff evolves into :doc:`lycanroc`:
|  -  At Level 25.
|  -  During Night.
| 
| Rockruff evolves into :doc:`lycanroc`:
|  -  At Level 25.
|  -  At Dusk.
|
